synopsis.text:
What starts as a typical day for Hagiwara Sakura, the acclaimed lead vocalist of the popular idol group Sweet Diva, takes an unexpected turn when she finds herself in the world of professional wrestling. Alongside her friend and fellow idol, Miyazawa Elena, Sakura is scheduled for a promotional event with the wrestling team Berserk. However, Elena's arrogance leads to a heated confrontation with top wrestler Rio Kazama, resulting in Elena's injury.

Fueled by fury and a desire for vengeance, Sakura retaliates against Rio and decides to join the professional wrestling league to prove the worth of idols. As she embarks on this challenging journey, Sakura discovers that the world of martial arts is far more demanding than her dance lessons. Will Sakura's determination and passion lead her to victory in the wrestling ring and avenge her dear friend? Join her as she navigates this thrilling and strenuous new path.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
